analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x9f5299182096c3461752c9110e0114efa0bfefb2.sol:
	Contract LoritaBi has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x9f5299182096c3461752c9110e0114efa0bfefb2.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x9f5299182096c3461752c9110e0114efa0bfefb2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0x9f5299182096c3461752c9110e0114efa0bfefb2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x9f5299182096c3461752c9110e0114efa0bfefb2.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
